item.description:
Our speaker this month will be CFII Ron Godin from the FCA Flight Center. Ron will discuss what he teaches his students and will be open to questions and answers. Ron will have a slide show and I'm sure we'll all pick up something new and interesting.

We'll also finish up our Young Eagles planning.

They'll be more added here as the time gets closer.

As always, food at 6:00 and meeting at 7:00.

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association EAA Chapter 1454 October Meetup
